timeline.message: Add Mariadb JDBC plugin and provide tests

timeline.bodyText:
I think you need a logo PR at the rocketbot UI repo.
One question, does Mariadb or Mariadb-JDBC make more sense? if Mariadb-JDBC, then should add mapping to Component-Server-Mappings:
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Ok, I agree. Other JDBC drivers are also using similar naming convention, will refactor it.
replies.author: efekaptan

timeline.bodyText: I think in Java, this should be Mariadb-jdbc or something indicating we instrumenting the client driver only.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: Please move these two just below the existing database config. Let's keep the database config in a same place
timeline.author: wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -125,6 +125,8 @@ property key | Description | Default |
 `plugin.http.http_params_length_threshold`| When `COLLECT_HTTP_PARAMS` is enabled, how many characters to keep and send to the OAP backend, use negative values to keep and send the complete parameters, NB. this config item is added for the sake of performance.  | `1024` |
 `correlation.element_max_number`|Max element count of the correlation context.|`3`|
 `correlation.value_max_length`|Max value length of correlation context element.|`128`|
+`plugin.mariadb.trace_sql_parameters`|If set to true, the parameters of the sql (typically `java.sql.PreparedStatement`) would be collected.|`false`|
+`plugin.mariadb.sql_parameters_max_length`|If set to positive number, the `db.sql.parameters` would be truncated to this length, otherwise it would be completely saved, which may cause performance problem.|`512`|

timeline.bodyText: OperationId isn't required, this is a legacy thing, please remove all.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.message: Reformat plugin description and remove healthcheck span from the test
